member.name: T:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationAgentSettings
member.summary: Navigation agent

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationAgentSettings.Height
member.summary: Height of the actor
member.userdoc: The height of the entities in this group. Entities can't enter areas with ceilings lower than this value.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationAgentSettings.MaxClimb
member.summary: Maximum vertical distance this agent can climb
member.userdoc: The maximum height that entities in this group can climb.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationAgentSettings.MaxSlope
member.summary: Maximum slope angle this agent can climb
member.userdoc: The maximum incline (in degrees) that entities in this group can climb. Entities can't go up or down slopes higher than this value.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationAgentSettings.Radius
member.summary: Radius of the actor
member.userdoc: The larger this value, the larger the area of the navigation mesh entities use. Entities can't pass through gaps of less than twice the radius.

member.summary: Performs the build of a navigation mesh
member.param: The build settings to pass to recast
A collection of agent settings to use, this will generate a layer in the navigation mesh for every agent settings in this collection (in the same order)
The collision groups that will affect which colliders are considered solid
A collection of bounding boxes to use as the region for which to generate navigation mesh tiles
A cancellation token to interrupt the build process

member.summary: Rebuilds outdated triangle data for colliders and recalculates hashes storing everything in StaticColliderData

member.name: T:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings
member.summary: Provides settings for the navigation mesh builder to control granularity and error margins

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.CellHeight
member.summary: The Height of a grid cell in the navigation mesh building steps using heightfields. A lower number means higher precision on the vertical axis but longer build times

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.CellSize
member.summary: The Width/Height of a grid cell in the navigation mesh building steps using heightfields. A lower number means higher precision on the horizontal axes but longer build times

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.TileSize
member.summary: Tile size used for Navigation mesh tiles, the final size of a tile is CellSize*TileSize

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.MinRegionArea
member.summary: The minimum number of cells allowed to form isolated island areas

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.RegionMergeArea
member.summary: Any regions with a span count smaller than this value will, if possible, be merged with larger regions.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.MaxEdgeLen
member.summary: The maximum allowed length for contour edges along the border of the mesh.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.MaxEdgeError
member.summary: The maximum distance a simplfied contour's border edges should deviate from the original raw contour.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.DetailSamplingDistance
member.summary: Sets the sampling distance to use when generating the detail mesh. (For height detail only.)

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Navigation.NavigationMeshBuildSettings.MaxDetailSamplingError
member.summary: The maximum distance the detail mesh surface should deviate from heightfield data. (For height detail only.)

member.name: T:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Xenko version.
member.remarks: Note: Xenko.xkpkg and PublicVersion versions should match. Also, during package build, PackageUpdateVersionTask is updating that file and expect some specific text regex so be careful if you change any of this.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.PublicVersion
member.summary: The version used by editor for display purpose. 4th digit needs to be at least 1 if used (due to NuGet special cases).

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: The current assembly version as text, currently same as .

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersionSimple
member.summary: The NuGet package version without special tags.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersion
member.summary: The NuGet package version.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersionSuffix
member.summary: The NuGet package suffix (i.e. -beta01). Note: might be replaced during package build.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.AssemblyInformationalVersion
member.summary: The informational assembly version, containing -dev or -g[git_hash] during package.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.AssemblyInformationalSuffix
member.summary: The assembly suffix. Note: replaced by git commit during package build.
